title: Key West Sunset: A nightly Celebration at Mallory Square
short_description: Todayâ€™s blog is all about the spectacular sunsets you can expect to see on your visit to Key West.
more_content:
Today’s blog is all about the spectacular sunsets you can expect to see on your visit to Key West.  We will take you on a visual tour starting with sunsets captured from a tower deck to the world famous Mallory Square Sunset Celebration in Key West.  The Marker is just steps from the Historic Seaport and a short walk to Mallory Square where you will experience a stunning light show at sea ~ a Key West Sunset Celebration:

 

See You at Sunset! 

Step outside the door and take a romantic Harbor walk stroll at the Historic Seaport while viewing a work of art ~ sunset in Key West.  Our neighbors at Turtle Kraals and Conch Republic Seafood Company are a great place to gather for cocktails and dinner during sunset.

Photo captured from Turtle Kraals Tower Deck Photo Credit: Turtle Kraals on Instagram

“Sunset is still my favorite color, and rainbow is second.”~ Mattie Stepanek

There's never one sunrise the same or one sunset the same. Carlos Santana

Softly the evening came with the sunset. ~ Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

(Photo courtesy of Laurence Norah/Florida Keys News Bureau)

@cnntravel on Instagram  says this about our Key West Sunsets:  Join the crowds in Mallory Square to watch the sun dip below the horizon. #gothere #mallorysquare #mallorysquaresunset #sunset #keywest

Coastal Living chose this photo as #CLPicks: : Sunset of the Day: Mallory Square, Key West, Florida Photo: @sightseeingkate

 

Before the sun sets the crowds gather at Mallory Square for performances and acts like no other. Here are a few acts you can expect to see while waiting for the main attraction:

Photo by @tjdrechselphotography on Instagram

One of the nation’s greatest staples, sunset at Mallory Square, Key West ~ T.J. Dreschel

Mallory Square street performers are one of the high points of the night as you never know what you're going to see.  Photo below captured by our friends at Southernmost Scavenger Hunt. 

Photo by Flickr user Joe Parks

When the sun goes down... we'll be grooving. When the sun goes down... we'll be feelin' alright! -Kenny Chesney

Know Before You Go: View the Key West Sunset Times any day of the year!

There’s nothing quite like a Mallory Square Sunset experience and The Marker is just steps away from all the activities. Whether you take a selfie with the sun setting or grab a photo of one of the performers, we’d love to see your snapshots from paradise.  Stay in touch and share your favorite sunset photos with us using the hashtag ##lovethemarker and see you at sunset!
